settings_cross_domains_description.message: Cross-domain autofill prompts will be skipped for the following domains and inputs will be autofilled automatically.
settings_cross_domains_description.description: Explains that trusted domains won't show cross-domain confirmation prompts

settings_cross_domains_empty.message: There are no trusted domains yet.
settings_cross_domains_empty.description: Message displayed when no domains are trusted for cross-domain autofill

settings_cross_domains_add_invalid.description: Validation message when the provided domain is invalid

settings_cross_domains_untrusted_descrip.message:
Cross-domain autofill will never happen 
for the following domains.
settings_cross_domains_untrusted_descrip.description: Explains that untrusted domains will always be blocked from cross-domain autofill

settings_cross_domains_untrusted_empty.message: There are no blocked domains yet.
settings_cross_domains_untrusted_empty.description: Message displayed when no domains are blocked for cross-domain autofill

settings_cross_domains_add_already_in_ot.message: This domain is already in the OTHER_LIST list. Remove it first.
settings_cross_domains_add_already_in_ot.description: Validation message when trying to add a domain that exists in the other list

settings_cross_domains_untrusted_add_suc.message: Successfully added domain to the blocked list
settings_cross_domains_untrusted_add_suc.description: Message displayed when a domain is successfully added to the untrusted list

settings_cross_domains_untrusted_add_dom.description: Label for the input field to add a new domain to the untrusted list

settings_cross_domains_untrusted_add_can.description: Title for the button to cancel blocking a new domain
